message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe will be highly valuable to you. I've set the price at $1,400,000.  I'm open to discussing this further if you have any questions or would like to negotiate.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,250,000. I believe the product is a great fit for me, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me in the middle at $1,300,000?

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget, but the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,375,000. I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the immense benefits you'll gain.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous discussion, but I really need to stay within my budget. Can we discuss further?
